JobDescription:
Verified Job On Employer Career Site

Job Summary:

Azurity Pharmaceuticals is a privately held specialty pharmaceutical company focused on innovative products for underserved patients. The Data Engineer will build and maintain scalable data pipelines and platforms, collaborating with analysts and data scientists to ensure high-quality data availability across the organization.

Responsibilities:

• Develop and maintain ETL/ELT workflows using SQL, Python, dbt, and Airflow

• Design and optimize data models in Snowflake and Postgres

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand and implement data requirements

• Follow best practices in software development (version control, testing, CI/CD)

• Operate within an Agile/Scrum development environment

• Document systems, pipelines, and data flows clearly and concisely

Qualifications:

Required:

• 2–4 years of experience in modern data engineering

• Strong proficiency in SQL, Python, dbt, Airflow

• Experience with Snowflake and PostgreSQL

• Understanding of software engineering principles (modular code, testing, version control)

• Exposure to agile methodologies

Preferred:

• Experience with Palantir Foundry is a strong plus

Company:

Azurity Pharmaceuticals is a developer of drug products and technologies to address the needs of patients. Founded in 1998, the company is headquartered in Woburn, Massachusetts, USA, with a team of 501-1000 employees. The company is currently Late Stage. Azurity Pharmaceuticals has a track record of offering H1B sponsorships.
Reasoning: The job revolves around building and maintaining data pipelines and collaborating with analysts and data scientists, which typically falls under a Data and Analytics division.
